channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Remote desktop software isn't just for work - DeskIn wants to help boost your gaming experience with a tool that's more at home in an office
item.description: DeskIn extends remote desktop functionality into gaming through multi-screen handling, file synchronization, customizable input mapping, and cross-platform access.

item.title: Apple is going to allow third-party app stores in Brazil, too
item.description: Apple is set to allow third-party app stores on iOS in Brazil next year after settling with the country's competition watchdog in a legal battle dating back to 2022, as reported by 9to5Mac. According to a machine translation of a press release from the Brazilian regulator CADE, it has approved a Term of Commitment to […]

item.title: Forget to sort all your Christmas presents? Pick up these discounted Nintendo gift cards for an easy win with the gamers in your life
item.description: ShopTo is offering a range of Nintendo Gift Card deals for the Holiday season.

item.title: Everything Netflix Is Taking Credit for Thanks to the Success of ‘Stranger Things’
item.description: With its finale on the horizon, the show has racked up impressive viewership numbers—but it's also had an impact on random pockets of culture, too.

item.title: $300 Intel B50 video card emerges as a surprisingly capable Pro GPU — but Nvidia's older Ada generation emerges as a bit of a bargain
item.description: Intel’s $300 B50 delivers surprisingly capable performance in entry-level AI, 3D rendering, and media editing tasks for compact setups.

item.title: Why leaders should encourage disagreement
item.description: Five ways to promote open, strategic conversation with your staff Leadership is becoming both easier and harder.

item.title: I love Lego and I've found the 18 best Boxing Day deals on Star Wars, Architecture and Classic sets
item.description: From starter sets to thousand-piece behemoths, save up to AU$150 on Lego from Amazon, Myer and more.

item.title: 'I can't eat one of those anymore': Percy Jackson star Walker Scobell on the surprising challenge he faced in season 2
item.description: Percy Jackson and the Olympians has some amazing stunt work this season, but lead star Walker Scobell revealed it came with some challenges.

item.title: Don’t wait for Boxing Day – I’ve found 15 excellent deals on Apple iPhones, iPads, AirPods and more
item.description: Boxing Day sales are a great time to save on Apple tech, including iPhones, MacBooks and AirPods. We're tracking all the best deals so you don't miss a thing.

item.title: Anime Movies Faced a Defining, Precarious Theatrical Crossroads in 2025
item.description: Films like 'Demon Slayer: Infinity Castle' and 'Chainsaw Man – The Movie: Reze Arc' proved the industry's stitched-episode preview events are overstaying their welcome.
